section.p: Yoritomo clasps you by the hand - a signal honour from a lord of such exalted rank. In front of his surviving guards he gives you the title Hatamoto. Note this on your Adventure Sheet. It means that you have the right to wear the Moonrise Clan’s livery and to act as the Shogun’s emissary.
‘Come to visit me soon in Mukogawa,’ says Yoritomo as he sets off.
